name: Atma
description: Atma is an original Bengali and Latin typeface family with a fun and informal feeling. The Bengali and Latin were developed in parallel as a studio collaboration by Jeremie Hornus, Gregori Vincens, Yoann Minet, and Roxane Gataud. The Atma project is led by Black Foundry, a type design foundry based in Paris, France. To contribute, see github.com/TypefactoryNet/Atma
author: Black Foundry
